variable.name: cards
variable.description: Displays the number of cards being exchanged.

variable.name: clothing
variable.description: Displays the name of the clothing being removed.

function.name: ifPlural
function.description: Displays text conditionally based on whether the clothing is singular or plural.

function.name: formal
function.description: Displays the formal name of the clothing.

function.name: position
function.description: Displays the clothing's position (upper, lower, etc.).

variable.name: marker
variable.description: Displays the value of a marker.

variable.name: weekday
variable.description: Displays the current day of the week.

variable.name: background
variable.description: Displays the name of the background the player is using.

function.name: location
function.description: Displays 'indoors' or 'outdoors' depending on which background is in play.
